original_title: Bare Fist: The Sport That Wouldn't Die
overview: About the fighter Lenny McLean (1949-1998), as seen through the eyes of his only son, Jamie. Lenny is also known as "The Guv'nor", was an English boxer, bouncer, criminal and prisoner, author, bodyguard, enforcer, weightlifter, television presenter and actor, and has been referred to as "the hardest man in Britain".
title: Bare Fist: The Sport That Wouldn't Die
